medical_history.chief_complaint: Mid epigastric pain for about two weeks, worsening and persistent.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about two weeks ago, initially mild but have worsened to persistent pain. The pain is not associated with any exacerbating factors and has not improved with Dilaudid. It radiates to her right shoulder and into her back.
medical_history.past_medical_history: GERD, hypertension, Barrett's esophagus, gastric ulcer, history of hysteroscopy, D&C, polypectomy, uterine bleeding, right total knee replacement, diabetes mellitus type II (resolved with weight loss).
